description.info: Zako-Dan is a mysterious organization that appears in the console release of Guilty Gear Isuka, consisting of Zako's A, B, and C (can also consist of Zako's X, Y, and Z). Seeming to be around just for comic relief, most of the Zako's can only use two out of four basic attacks.
description.design:
Zako A's clothing consists of a grey slevless jacket with matching colored pants. He also wears a pair of black wristbands.
Zako B is a large muscled man whose outfit consists of grey leather pants and an uncoverd torso accompanied with black leather gloves, and silver hair.
Zako C is the female member, and wears a pair of gloves with three potruding nail like appendages that she uses as her primary weapon. Her standard clothing consists of sleveless blue jumpsuit. She ties her hair in a bun.
